3.01.name: wordpress/repostus
3.01.description:
Your Content, Everywhere

Repost delivers a world of content to more people and places on the web. You can instantly share your content with other publishers, bloggers, and websites. Discover new content from the millions of articles already available to repost on your site. And it's free.

Content Integrity

When your content is reposted onto another site, our embed code loads the content from its source at your site into the viewer's browser. Content integrity and updating are guaranteed.

More Content for Your Site

An article recommendation widget suggests posts related to your site, giving you access to millions of articles.

Improve Your Search Rank

Content never lives on the reposted page, so your site's search ranking is never diluted by multiple reposted copies. No duplicate content penalty.

Easy Set Up

Simple to use and simple to install. Just add our button to your content pages and we manage the
